tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE speech_recognition_accuracy (
    audio_id INT,
    accuracy_score FLOAT,
    confidence_level FLOAT,
    recognition_status ENUM('Success','Failure'),
    processing_time DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE voice_recognition_feedback (
    feedback_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    audio_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE voice_samples (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sample_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    user_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE voice_patterns (
    pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE speech_recognition (
    recognition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id UUID,
    pattern_id UUID,
    recognition_result VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE recognition_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    recognition_id UUID,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
)
